manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Action Bible Guess-It Game The Action Bible Easter The Action Bible: Faith in Action Edition The Action Bible: Heroes and Villains The Action Bible Study Bible ESV The Action Storybook Bible Age Range 6 and Up 6 and Up 8 and Up 8 and Up 8 and Up 4-8 Page Count 99 Unique Cards 64 832 160 1,248 256 Description 99 Oversized Cards with 15 Clues Each Picture Storybook Showcasing 25 Stories about Jesus' Resurrection 238 Fast-Paced Narratives, Each with a QR Code to an Interactive Digital Experience The Ultimate Authority on 75 of the Bible's Most Curiously Relatable Characters Full Text Bible 15 Key Episodes, Each with Several Stories

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really happy with this book.
reviews.reviewText: When I heard about this Action Bible I wanted to check it out. I really like the quality of the art and paper it is printed on. It is great to SEE stories from the Bible if you are like me a grew up reading comics.If you know a youth that you want to introduced to the Bible, I think this may be a good way to do it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This book is sure to prompt the interest of young and old readers alike because of its beautiful illustrations and quality content. It has substantial hard-cover binding to accommodate its 800+ pages. The vivid colored illustrations bring to life these ancient classic stories that everyone, regardless of religious denomination should know.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've been eyeballing this for months! Finally ordered it and I am so happy that I did. The Bible in comic book style?? Yes please! How fun to read it this way. Also, a good way to try to get my toddler to sit and listen. Maybe, lol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My 6yr old has read through his kid's Bible multiple times. This one is the highlights of the Bible in graphic novel form. He really loves it! We are really enjoying reading it together!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For kids 10 and under!
reviews.reviewText: This is a fun and innovative way to get children engaged in scripture. Most children enjoy comics. The art is cool and vivid. The stories are put together is a way kids can wrap their minds around visually and mentally. I do however fully believe there is no substitute for the actual scriptures. KJV Bibles are the way to go overall. But to open the door to reading the actual word, this is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I Got This Because Reading The Bible Wasn’t Descriptive Enough For Me. I’m A Visual Learner and This Helped Me Understand The Bible A Lot More Clearly Now. 10/10.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Mi hijo ama los libros, y esto es una buena forma de ellos comprender más e interesarse más por la biblia, la palabra de Dios.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great addition for your library or for kids
reviews.reviewText: I picked this up as something interesting to have on my shelves alongside many books of apologetics and reference material. I may have read comics in my younger years, but there is no shame in an adult going through this book to see how the artist interpreted what is written in scripture. If I have kids some day, I would love to have them read through parts of this as they read & hear about the Word of God.This book is a great merging of interests. It reminds me a bit of the comic books which Jack Chick created years ago. He's known for his small, black & white "Chick tracts," but he also made several full color, full size comics.I just got my copy of this book yesterday so I've only had a chance to read through some of it. Since this is a comic book telling of parts of God's Word [imagine the undertaking of putting all of the Word into comic format??], I have to say the art matters, and in this it's very well done! So far I haven't seen anything 'heretical,' so you should be fine giving this to children.I like that each story/section has the scripture references so that (hopefully) a younger one will want to open up his or her bible and read the full story. The visuals and condensed storytelling (a compliment, not a complaint) in this book should help those who are more visual learners.It's also great to see the story of redemption is told chronologically. By that I mean the whole of the bible, e.g. the gospels are 'blended' together. There's even a brief inter-testament section with mention of Alexander the Great and the Maccabees.I was pleased to see two passages which "made the cut," Judges 3:12-30 (it's a bit grim!) and Luke 4:16-30.

Got this for my daughter who has autism but wants to know more about the word of God. This has spiked her interest significantly, and has helped her pick up reading the actual bible to learn God’s word. It’s not like a regular Bible as it is made so kids can understand it in a simple and colourful way, but the spirit of the word is in the book. I see it as a wonderful stepping stone to help kids find interest in God’s word and begin to build their faith independently.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Happy and exited with my purchase
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I was really happy with my purchase. It came bigger than I expected and so engaging. I bought it for myself to encourage myself study the word in a graphic way. I was so happy with my purchase I bought twice to gift my friend's daughter. I'll definitely buy some more. Super super happy with this purchase. I highly recommend it
It's the best one for kids 8 -12 yrs.my son loves it
My boys ages 3-7 love to read this bible with their dad
